name: Build-A-Bear Workshop: Friendship Valley
description:
Help your Build-A-Bear Workshop furry friends make Friendship Valley the most furbulous town of all! Explore the 3D world, customize the town, go on quests and play mini-games, all while having bearific fun!

Features

• Choose your special furry friend from 13 playable and customizable characters.
• Decorate and transform the town by replacing bricks and wood, changing the color of doors and windows, planting flowers and more.
• Build, decorate and customize your furry friend's house with wallpaper, furniture, and plants! Even build your own car!
